data.title: Antioch: Man fatally shot in Antioch identified
data.meta_description: A 57-year-old man shot to death over the weekend has been identified by the Contra Costa County Sheriff's Office.
data.text:
ANTIOCH — A 57-year-old man shot to death over the weekend has been identified by the Contra Costa County Sheriff’s Office.

Raul Garcia, of Antioch, died after being rushed to a hospital, police said. Officers found him on St. Christopher Court around 9:36 p.m. on Sunday.

According to police, the early investigation revealed he had been shot in the roadway in the 3400 block of Rio Grande Drive after a confrontation with another person. Garcia made his way to the court, about one-tenth of a mile away, where he was found.

First responders performed first aid on him, before an ambulance took him to a hospital.

Police have not offered a motive, and they haven’t announced any arrests.

Anyone with information was urged by police to call Det. Gonzalez at 925-779-6874 or the police non-emergency line at 925-778-2441.Information can be texted to text-a-tip at 274637 (CRIMES) using the key word ANTIOCH.
